text: Kogda angely - poslantsy Allakha - prishli k Lutu, on, uvidev ikh, ogorchilsya, boyas' rasputstva svoyego naroda po otnosheniyu k nim. On byl ne v sostoyanii ikh zashchitit'. No oni uspokoili yego, skazav: "Ne boysya razvratnykh deystviy tvoyego naroda po otnosheniyu k nam i ne ogorchaysya. My ved' prishli pogubit' zhiteley etogo seleniya, no my spasom tebya i tvoyu sem'yu, a tvoya nechestivaya zhena budet v chisle pogibshikh
